column4: When I try to remove Gaim from using Synaptic, it asks to remove "nautilus-sendto" and "ubuntu" desktop, also... that doesn't sound good
I looked "ubuntu-desktop" up and I think that is almost the last thing I'd ever want to uninstall
I installed pidgen, and I want to get rid of Gaim via synaptic, it tells me I have to remove "ubuntu-desktop."  Is there a workaround?
donbt worry about it.. either leave it in.. or remove ubuntu-desktop. its a metapackage
